mapper.select: SELECT a.iboard, a.icategory, a.title, b.nm, a.contents, a.created_at createdAt, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board_file WHERE iboard = a.iboard) fileCnt, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board_comment WHERE iboard = a.iboard AND public_fl = 'Y') commentCnt FROM board a INNER JOIN user b ON a.iuser = b.iuser WHERE a.iboard = #{iboard}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(icategory, isubcategory, iuser, title, contents) VALUES (#{icategory}, 1, #{iuser}, ' ', ' ')
INSERT INTO board_pic(iboard, original_name, uuid_name) VALUES (#{iboard}, #{originalName}, #{uuidName})
INSERT INTO board_file(iboard, original_name, uuid_name) VALUES (#{iboard}, #{originalName}, #{uuidName})
mapper.select: SELECT itag, NAME FROM tag WHERE NAME LIKE('%${tag}%')
SELECT icomment, unm, upw, contents, created_at FROM board_comment WHERE iboard = #{iboard} AND public_fl = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT board_comment(iboard, unm, upw, contents) VALUES(#{iboard}, #{unm}, #{upw}, #{contents})
mapper.update: UPDATE board_comment SET contents = #{contents} WHERE icomment = #{icomment}
